name: Susik Yoon
content: HomeSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationData & Adaptive Intelligence Systems LabKorea UniversityMissionEmpower innovation through data-driven insights, fostering intelligence systems with adaptive capabilitiesImage created by DALLÂ·EWe are looking for motivated undergraduate students to join our lab as research interns during the upcoming winter vacation. For prospective students, please send a CV and an essay describing their background, motivation, and research fit to susik@korea.ac.kr (application period: Nov 17 ~ Dec 6). Related information can be found in references and publications. Please understand that available positions are very limited, and applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis.ðŸ“° News[2025.11] Papers on continual retrieval, community search, and heterogeneous paper on adaptive prompt tuning for continual learning accepted to ICML 2024Â [2024.04] Two undergraduate students joined DAIS LabÂ [2024.03] DAIS Lab at Korea University opened ðŸŽ‰ðŸ“‹Research AreaWe are interested in broad topics in Data Science (DS) and Artificial Intelligence (AI). We identify real-world challenges with significant practical impacts and address them through DS/AI methodologies by leveraging {Evolving, (Un)structured data} X {Foundation models} X {Human-curated knowledge}.Examples of research topics include, but are not limited to,DS and AI methodologiesData mining, Machine learning, Deep learning, Multi-modal learningAnomaly detection, Classification, Clustering, Recommendation, SummarizationLearning from evolving dataReal-time machine learning, Continual learning, Data stream mining, Time-series mining, Concept drift adaptationLearning from (un)structured dataNatural Language Processing, Text mining, Information retrieval, Knowledge structuration, Representation learningExploiting Foundation models (i.e., pretrained language, vision, multimodal models)Retrieval-augmented generation, Prompt tuning, Model adaptationExploiting human-curated knowledge (i.e., Knowledge base, metadata, weak labels)Semi/weakly-supervised learning, Active learning, Knowledge base, Fake detectionSee our [publications] for the full list of previous research papers.[KDD24] Online Drift Detection with Maximum Concept Discrepancy[ICML24] One Size Fits All for Semantic Shifts: Adaptive Prompt Tuning for Continual Learning[WWW24] Breaking the Time-Frequency Granularity Discrepancy in Time-Series Anomaly Detection[EMNLP23-Findings] MEGClass: Text Classification with Extremely Weak Supervision via Mutually-Enhancing Text Granularities[ACL23-Findings] DynaMiTE: Discovering Explosive Topic Evolutions with User Guidance[ICML23] Context Consistency Regularization for Label Sparsity in Time Series[SIGIR23] Unsupervised Story Discovery from Continuous News Streams via Scalable Thematic Embedding[WWW23] PDSum: Prototype-driven Continuous Summarization of Evolving Multi-document Sets Stream[WWW23] SCStory: Self-supervised and Continual Online Story Discovery[KDD22] Adaptive Model Pooling for Online Deep Anomaly Detection from a Complex
